attributes.action: Save Planet Rock DAB Radio Station from closure on 28th March 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Planet Rock's parent company GCap Media have put Planet Rock up for sale, however if a buyer cannot be found the station will close on 28th March 2008.
This DAB station one of the most popular with over 500,000 regular listeners, and the only one playing classic rock covering 40 years. How can the Government encourage the growth of DAB Digital Radio, our investment in the equipment to listen, yet multinational companies such as GCap are allowed to close stations down because they don't fit with their core business plan?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
